post.title: if you had your choice between the two..
post.content: if you had to choose, which would it be? your thoughts will be greatly appreciated. thanks/ kef iq5's (front) iq1's (sorrounds) iq2c (center) ed a3-300 (sub) or av123 x-mtm encore tower (front) x-ls encore monitor (sorrounds) x-cs encore (center) mfw-15 (subwoofer)
